REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f0917 reute u f BC-ISRAEL-TENDERS-TONIGH 03-04 0037

TEXT.TITLE: ISRAEL TENDERS TONIGHT FOR CORN AND/OR SORGHUM
TEXT.BODY: Israel will tender overnight for 33,000 long tons of U.S. sorghum and/or 22,000 long tons of U.S. corn for April shipment, private export sources said. Reuter
